title: Person Medium Dark Skin Tone Curly Hair
description: Represents a person with medium-dark skin tone and curly hair, symbolizing identity, natural hair, and diversity.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person with medium-dark skin tone and curly hair emoji is beautifully rendered with naturalistic texture and volume to the curls, showcasing Apple’s attention to diverse representation. The soft, rounded edges and gentle 3D shading give the figure a friendly and approachable appearance, conveying individuality and warmth. This emoji on Apple devices is a versatile way to represent oneself or others, adding a personal and authentic touch to messages about identity, personality, or simply being present.
